resources.string: - At the start of the game all tiles (the numbered buttons) are "open", showing the numerals 1 to 9. The goal of the game is to end with the lowest score.
- Player 1 begins their turn by rolling the dice
- If none of the remaining tiles are higher than 6, the player may roll only one die. Otherwise, the player must roll both dice.
- So, on their first turn, each player will always roll both dice
- After rolling the dice, the player adds up the total of both dice and then "closes" a single combination of open numbers that equals the total number on the dice, by clicking on the numbered tiles.
- The player then rolls the dice again, aiming to close more tiles.

- The player continues rolling the dice and closing tiles until the dice given them a total that the remaining tiles cannot add up to. At this point, the player\'s turn is over and their score is the sum of their remaining tiles and the next player may begin their turn.
- After every player has taken a turn, the player with the lowest score wins.
- If a player manages to close all their tiles first they\'ve hit the Jackpot and immediately win.
- Touch and hold on the screen to bring up the menu.
